display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | Start repeating structure on PDF

AMd.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
AMd.name: config_info

AMf.caption: Name
AMf.doc: Unique name of this repeating structure, so you can write this name in the element to specify where it will be inserted.
AMf.name: repeating_structure_name

AMg.caption: How many structures
AMg.doc: How many repeated structures you want. For example if you're working with a list of users, use "List of User's:count" to run over the list once for each item. Optionally, you can specify a number by typing it or getting it somehow else, like "5" and the structure will be repeated 5 times.
AMg.name: iterations_count
